name: Utah

processing_metadata.description: Official Utah DMV processing rules and validation requirements

global_rules.code_system: Information needed - research plate type code system
global_rules.character_restrictions: Does not use letter 'O' on standard plates - only number zero '0'; Full rules: A12 3BC Pattern (Greatest Snow on Earth & Life Elevated)                                   1A23BC Pattern (In God We Trust); Does NOT use the letter 'O'. Only the number '0' is used. Verify the tag as UT-8589005. State name is visible in the top right corner of the tag.

stacked_characters.notes: State name visible in top right corner of plate for identification

notes: Utah does not use the letter 'O' on standard plates. Only the number zero '0' is used to avoid confusion. Source: OOS.txt compilation - requires verification with official DMV documentation. Does not use letter 'O' on standard plates. Always use zero '0'.
